scripts.c:lang: npm run c:core && npm run -w packages/pb-lang-support compile
scripts.c:pbp: npm run c:core && npm -w packages/pb-project-files run compile
scripts.c: npm run c:core && npm run c:lang && npm run c:forms && npm run c:pbp
scripts.vsix:lang: npm run c:core && npm -w packages/pb-lang-support run compile && npm -w packages/pb-lang-support run webpack:prod && cd packages/pb-lang-support && npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies -o ../../pb-lang-support.vsix
scripts.vsix:forms: npm -w packages/pb-forms-editor run compile && cd packages/pb-forms-editor && npx @vscode/vsce package --no-dependencies -o ../../pb-forms-editor.vsix
scripts.vsix:pbp: npm run c:core && npm -w packages/pb-project-files run compile && cd packages/pb-project-files && npx @vscode/vsce package -o ../../pb-project-files.vsix
scripts.vsix: npm run vsix:lang && npm run vsix:forms && npm run vsix:pbp
